title: Qlick Gaming, Looking for Scrim Contacts
body:
Qlick Gaming, are a newly founded team, with aspirations of making it all the way to the OPL and beyond, however to do so, we need your help! If your team, or a team you're involved with want to scrim, on a regular basis or not be sure to either reply to this very post, add Bearabouts in game or e-mail management@qlickgaming.com to get in contact with us! 

Bearabouts
Community Manager
Qlick Gaming
